scripts.test-dev: npm run clean && npm run build && cd build/test/ && cross-env ENVIRONMENT='dev' mocha --file *.js --config ../../.mocharc.js --timeout 25000
scripts.test-prod: npm run clean && npm run build && cd build/test/ && cross-env ENVIRONMENT='prod' mocha --file *.js --config ../../.mocharc.js --timeout 25000
